sections.title: Click here to tweak this text however you want.
sections.description: This text is fully editable and ready for your personal touch. Just click here, head over to the section window, or dive straight into the code to make changes as you see fit. Whether it's about the content, formatting, font, or anything in between, editing is just a click away.

sections.title: Doces
sections.description: Doces de São João: Um Festival de Sabores

posts.title: O VERDADEIRO BRIGADEIRO MAÇÃ DO AMOR
posts.author: DIKA DA NAKA
posts.material: Ingredientes   1 caixa de leite condensado ( 395g) 1 colher (sopa) de manteiga( 20g) 2 colheres (sopa) de creme de leite ( 30g) 50g de chocolate branco  1 maçã ralada.   Calda  2 xícaras (chá) de açúcar refinado (360g) ½ xícara (chá) de água (120ml) 4 colheres (sopa) de vinagre branco (60ml) 1 colher (chá) de corante em pó vermelho bordô (5ml)
